scripts.build: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const tsc=require.resolve('typescript/bin/tsc');const pkgDir=path.dirname(require.resolve('./package.json'));const distDir=path.join(pkgDir,'dist');if(!fs.existsSync(distDir)){fs.mkdirSync(distDir,{recursive:true});}process.chdir(pkgDir);try{execSync('node '+tsc,{stdio:'inherit'});const output=path.join(distDir,'index.js');if(!fs.existsSync(output)){console.error('Build failed: dist/index.js was not created');process.exit(1);}}catch(e){console.error('TypeScript compilation failed');process.exit(1);}"
